segment.source: If your developer account has been granted the appropriate permissions, you can generate and download preinstall packages that an OEM can use to include your app in their image.
segment.target: If your developer account has been granted the appropriate permissions, you can generate and download preinstall packages that an OEM can use to include your app in their image.

segment.source: Generate preinstall packages for OEMs
segment.target: Generate preinstall packages for OEMs

segment.source: Generate preinstall packages for OEMs
segment.target: Generate preinstall packages for OEMs

segment.source: If your developer account has been granted the appropriate permissions, you can generate and download preinstall packages that an OEM can use to include your app in their image.
segment.target: If your developer account has been granted the appropriate permissions, you can generate and download preinstall packages that an OEM can use to include your app in their image.

segment.source: Preinstall permissions are only enabled on developer accounts that are sponsored by OEMs.
segment.target: Preinstall permissions are only enabled on developer accounts that are sponsored by OEMs.

segment.source: Important preinstall policy & limitations
segment.target: Important preinstall policy & limitations

segment.source: Preinstall apps must be certified through Windows Dev Center to have the latest Store license so that they are able to connect to the Store and receive app updates.
segment.target: Preinstall apps must be certified through Windows Dev Center to have the latest Store license so that they are able to connect to the Store and receive app updates.

segment.source: Any app that is already preinstalled must be and remain free in all markets.
segment.target: Any app that is already preinstalled must be and remain free in all markets.

segment.source: Generating preinstall packages
segment.target: Generating preinstall packages

segment.source: Once an account has been enabled with preinstall permissions, complete the following steps:
segment.target: Once an account has been enabled with preinstall permissions, complete the following steps:

segment.source: In your dashboard, navigate to the app that is to be preinstalled.
segment.target: In your dashboard, navigate to the app that is to be preinstalled.

segment.source: In the left navigation menu, expand App management and then click Current packages.
segment.target: In the left navigation menu, expand App management and then click Current packages.

segment.source: In the Request packages for OS preinstallation section, click Enable downloadable packages.
segment.target: In the Request packages for OS preinstallation section, click Enable downloadable packages.

segment.source: A confirmation dialog will appear, noting that apps preinstalled on an OS prior to Windows 10 must be free.
segment.target: A confirmation dialog will appear, noting that apps preinstalled on an OS prior to Windows 10 must be free.

segment.source: Select Enable.
segment.target: Select Enable.

segment.source: Find the package that you want to download, and click the appropriate Generate package link.
segment.target: Find the package that you want to download, and click the appropriate Generate package link.

segment.source: Note Generation time for preinstall packages will vary depending on the size of the package you have selected.
segment.target: Note Generation time for preinstall packages will vary depending on the size of the package you have selected.

segment.source: You can leave this page and come back later, or leave the page open.
segment.target: You can leave this page and come back later, or leave the page open.

segment.source: When the package has been generated, a link to Download package will appear.
segment.target: When the package has been generated, a link to Download package will appear.

segment.source: Click this link to download the .zip file.
segment.target: Click this link to download the .zip file.

segment.source: You can then provide this .zip file to the OEM for inclusion in their OS image.
segment.target: You can then provide this .zip file to the OEM for inclusion in their OS image.

segment.source: Support
segment.target: Support

segment.source: If you have further questions about generating preinstall packages, please email partnerops@microsoft.com.
segment.target: If you have further questions about generating preinstall packages, please email partnerops@microsoft.com.
